vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
εὐδοκ-ία, ἡ,
={εὐδόκησις}, especially of God, [LXX+NT]; good will, [NT]; contentment, [Refs 1st c.BC+]
__2 object of desire, [LXX]
__3 variant for{εὐδοκιμίη} in [Refs 5th c.BC+]
vocabInfos.shortDef: goodwill, good purpose, favor, pleasure, desire
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
goodwill, good purpose, favor, pleasure, desire
good will, favor, Lk. 2:14; good pleasure, purpose, intention, Mt. 11:26; Lk. 10:21; Eph. 1:5, 9; Phil. 2:13; by implication desire, Rom. 10:1; Phil. 1:15; 2Thess. 1:11*
vocabInfos._es_Definition: benevolencia ; buena voluntad, agrado, favor ; anhelo, propósito, elección
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
1) 美意
2) 喜愛
3) 希望, 渴望 (羅 10:1; 帖後 1:11)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
1) 美意
2) 喜爱
3) 希望, 渴望 (罗 10:1; 帖后 1:11)
vocabInfos._vi_Definition: điều ưa thích; mong muốn; điều rất thích thú; sự toại nguyện.
